name: The ivory "heart" of Paris: Montmartre and the Sacré-Cœur
description: Let's keep it simple. Paris has so much to offer that sometimes it's best to keep a tour limited to just a few locations and a smaller itinerary, allowing you to relax whilst taking in the sights and views Paris has to offer. On this trip we will taste some French coffee from a cute café, savour a delicious "Amelie style" crépe alongside a picturesque carousel, then work it off by climbing the steps through the gorgeous village of Montmartre to the Sacré-Cœur.
